# Load libraries

suppressMessages(library(scPrediction))

# Simulate datasets


```{r simulate_data}
n.genes <- c(c(100, 500), seq(1000, 5000, 1000))
sim <- lapply(n.genes, function(x){splatSimulate(nGenes = x, groupCells = c(50, 50), method = "groups", seed = 99, verbose = FALSE)})
names(sim) <- paste0('n', n.genes)
```

```{r get_GEmatrix_pheno}
sim.data.pheno <- lapply(sim, function(s){
  sim.pheno <- phenoData(object = s)@data
  sim.data <- exprs(s)
  list(sim.data = sim.data, sim.pheno = sim.pheno)
})
```


```{r setup_cluster}
n.cores <- 12
cl <- makeCluster(n.cores, outfile = '')
registerDoParallel(cl)
```


```{r define_iterations}
n <- 50
iter <- seq_len(n)
```

```{r define_output_function}
comb <- function(x, ...) {
  lapply(seq_along(x),
    function(i) c(x[[i]], lapply(list(...), function(y) y[[i]])))
}
```


```{r message_bootstrap}
cat("Bootstrapping starts...\n")
```



```{r function_ApplyMethods}
ApplyMethods <- function(sim.n){
  
  features <- seq_len(nrow(sim.n$sim.data))
  cell.class <- sim.n$sim.pheno[,c('Cell', 'Group')]
  groups <- sim.n$sim.pheno$Group
  expression.data <- sim.n$sim.data
  
  # seeds <- sample(1:50000, size = 100, replace = TRUE)
  seeds.select <- c(18963,11835,38268,4071,515,38489,43612,37577,24484,20562,28354,30815,29137,29246,23762,15286,33605,26739,22919,32596,14373,46398,46064,39920,24110,20294,41148,48654,34029,25359,3016,22720,43078,45935,7979,430,3033,27125,10152,38860,13293,4566,31483,12965,21939,31440,31397,2100,19793,15853,43780,40804,9741,44354,13126,40070,40929,21237,38687,8988,19795,44104,39181,49170,48984,39446,22446,37099,11091,47020,45130,16437,42807,42560,44595,33712,34490,38548,30927,47522,41510,4189,5421,36331,39808,16249,40572,41146,41607,11705,12381,4728,31350,25172,4763,4181,17638,46408,39838,16460)
  
  seeds.compare <- c(9351,26634,16496,4146,30796,47316,37798,2283,37324,12043,20234,28458,13545,5507,39962,2151,24861,36024,1727,4813,44701,32887,32101,38658,28058,4139,36523,24541,7204,46413,21999,9407,10986,13552,35608,1484,40106,18300,44515,32833,48557,19541,22954,32915,33148,9983,5081,28216,49692,20618,21360,30864,16166,35157,10310,25301,36652,44388,30874,10472,24462,36189,45468,19067,35199,29697,18077,7920,27799,37463,29394,6106,22739,10333,2933,30697,764,34893,27751,12255,28325,42947,31440,39348,48143,27205,341,31589,45188,111,759,5723,36586,36847,33712,47969,3351,23386,35620,40907)
  
  i <- 3
  results <- foreach(i = iter, .combine = comb, .multicombine = TRUE, .init = list(list(), list(), list(), list(), list(), list(), list(), list(), list(), list(), list()), .packages = c("scPrediction")) %dopar% {
    
    cat('Bootstrap replicate:', i, "running....", "\n")
    
    # Random sampling for training and testing datasets ----------------------
    data.train.test <- BuildTrainTest(groups = groups,
                                      group.select = "Group1",
                                      features = features, 
                                      expression.data = expression.data, 
                                      seed.select = seeds.select[i], 
                                      seed.compare = seeds.compare[i])
    
    # Initialize variables
    test <- data.train.test$test
    training <- data.train.test$training
    response <- data.train.test$response
    
    # Run lasso
    prediction <- FitRegModel(test, training, response,
                              family = "binomial",
                              alpha = 1, 
                              seed = 92)
    
    lasso <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    lasso$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run elastic-net (alpha = 0.9)
    prediction <- FitRegModel(test, training, response,
                              family = "binomial",
                              alpha = 0.9,
                              seed = 92)
    
    
    elastic.net.0.9 <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    elastic.net.0.9$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run elastic-net (alpha = 0.5)
    prediction <- FitRegModel(test, training, response,
                              family = "binomial",
                              alpha = 0.5,
                              seed = 92)
    
    
    elastic.net.0.5 <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    elastic.net.0.5$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run elastic-net (alpha = 0.1)
    prediction <- FitRegModel(test, training, response,
                              family = "binomial",
                              alpha = 0.1,
                              seed = 92)
    
    elastic.net.0.1 <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    elastic.net.0.1$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run ridge
    prediction <- FitRegModel(test, training, response,
                              family = "binomial",
                              alpha = 0,
                              seed = 92)
    
    ridge <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    ridge$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run MARS (Multivariate adaptive regression splines)
    prediction <- RunCaret(test,
                           training,
                           response,
                           method = 'earth',
                           seed = 92)
    
    mars <-  GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    mars$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run Random Forests
    prediction <- RunCaret(test,
                           training,
                           response,
                           method = 'rf',
                           seed = 92)
    
    random.forest <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    random.forest$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run Naive Bayes
    suppressWarnings(prediction <- RunCaret(test,
                                            training,
                                            response,
                                            method = 'nb',
                                            seed = 92))
    
    naive.bayes <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    naive.bayes$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run SVM with linear kernel
    prediction <- RunCaret(test,
                           training,
                           response,
                           method = 'svmLinear',
                           seed = 92)
    
    svm.linear <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    svm.linear$fit <- prediction
    
    # Run Generalized Linear Model
    prediction <- RunCaret(test,
                           training,
                           response,
                           method = 'glm',
                           seed = 92)
    
    glm <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    glm$fit <- prediction
    
    # Classification and regression tree
    prediction <- RunCaret(test,
                           training,
                           response,
                           method = 'rpart',
                           seed = 92)
    
    cart <- GetAccuracy(prediction = prediction, cell.class = cell.class)
    cart$fit <- prediction
    
    i <- i  + 1
    return(list(lasso, elastic.net.0.9, elastic.net.0.5, elastic.net.0.1, ridge, mars, random.forest, naive.bayes, svm.linear, glm, cart))
  }
  
  names(results) <- c('lasso', 'elastic.net.0.9', 'elastic.net.0.5', 'elastic.net.0.1', 'ridge', 'mars', 'random.forests', 'naive.bayes', 'svm.linear', 'glm', 'cart')
  return(results)
}
```

```{r run_predictions, results="hide"}
res <- lapply(sim.data.pheno[1:2], ApplyMethods)
```


```{r stop_cluster}
stopCluster(cl)
```


```{r get_accuracy}
res %>% 
  lapply(function(sim){
    lapply(sim,
           function(model){
             lapply(model, '[[', 'accuracy') %>% unlist
           }
    )}) %>% 
  lapply(as.data.frame) %>% 
  lapply(function(x){
    x <- gather(x, key = 'Model', value = 'Accuracy')
    model.order <- c( "glm", "mars", "lasso", "elastic.net.0.9", "elastic.net.0.5", "elastic.net.0.1", "ridge", "svm.linear", "random.forests", "naive.bayes", "cart")
    x$Model <- factor(x$Model, levels = model.order)
    x
  }) -> accuracy.sim
```


```{r plot_accuracy}
PlotAccuracy <- function(sim, label){
  n.genes <- gsub('n', '', label)
  p <- ggplot(sim, aes(x = Model, y  = Accuracy, fill = Model)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    ggtitle(label = 'Simulated data from 100 cells and 2 clusters (50 cells each)', 
          subtitle = paste('Number of genes included in dataset:', n.genes)) +
    scale_color_brewer() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1)) +
    guides(fill = FALSE)
  
  return(p)
}

plots <- mapply(PlotAccuracy, accuracy.sim, names(accuracy.sim), SIMPLIFY = FALSE)
```


```{r save_plots}
SavePlots <- function(p, label){
  ggsave(filename = paste0('simulation_100_cells_ngenes-', gsub('n', '', label), '.png'),
         plot = p,
         device = 'png',
         dpi = 350)
}

mapply(SavePlots, plots, names(plots))
```


```{r reduce_accuracy_matrix}
accuracy.all <- mapply(function(sim, label){
  sim$ngenes <- label
  sim
}, accuracy.sim, names(accuracy.sim), SIMPLIFY = FALSE) %>% 
  Reduce(rbind, .)

```


```{r plot_accuracy_per_model}
PlotAccuracyAll <- function(model){
  p <- ggplot(model, aes(x = ngenes, y = Accuracy, fill = ngenes)) +
    geom_boxplot() +
    scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Spectral") +
    stat_summary(fun.y = median, geom = "line", aes(group=1)) +
    stat_summary(fun.y = median, geom = "point") +
    facet_wrap(~Model, ncol = 4, scales = "free") +
    scale_y_continuous(limits = c(min(model$Accuracy) - 0.01, 1)) +
    guides(fill = FALSE)
  p
}

accuracy.all %>% 
  split(accuracy.all$Model) %>% 
  lapply(PlotAccuracyAll) %>% 
  cowplot::plot_grid(plotlist = .) %>% 
  ggsave(filename = paste0('simulation_100_cells_ngenes-accuracy_per_model.png'),
         plot = .,
         device = 'png',
         dpi = 350)
  
```
